name: DocumentPress
author: Abdullah Irfan

sections.description:
Allows you to embed your documents in any format (Mircrosoft Powerpoint, Word, Excel, PDF .docx, .xls, .pdf, .ppt .anything!) on to your wordpress site.

This plugin supports a wide variety of file types
* Microsoft Word (docx, docm, dotm, dotx)
* Microsoft Excel (xlsx, xlsb, xls, xlsm)
* Microsoft PowerPoint (pptx, ppsx, ppt, pps, pptm, potm, ppam, potx, ppsm)
* TIFF Images (tif, tiff)
* Adobe Illustrator (ai)
* Scalable Vector Graphics (svg)
sections.installation:
Installing “DocumentPress” can be done either by searching for “DocumentPress” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installing “DocumentPress” can be done either by searching for “DocumentPress” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Do I need a Google account to use this?

Yes, you do.
sections.changelog:
2.1

  • 2017-12-24
  • Moving to HTTPS to fulfill Google’s API requirements.

1.9

  • 2017-3-5
  • Allows users to set permissions to restricted on Google Drive files.

1.0

  • 2016-1-25
  • Initial release
